name: Local-PVP Twin-Stick-Shooter
description:
This game is a side-product to my last students project. I had to write a c++ game engine on my own, and make sure it fulfills a certain task, which I could choose myself. I chose to make a 2D engine for games with a destructible landscape like WORMS.

Currently, there is only local multiplayer with 2 to 4 players.

Controls:
You'll need a gamepad, since it is a twin-stick-shooter ...
Left-Stick: Move
Right-Stick: Aim
Right-Trigger: Shoot
Left-Trigger: Set a wall

Let me know if you'd like me to add some things!
